attributes.action: Allow the e-petition service to register signatures AGAINST the proposal alongside signatures in favour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of Britain, once drawn to an internet petition, don't have time to search for the opposing view. 

Because of this each petition should allow signatures to be signed either in favour or against the petition.

rejection.details: We will put your thoughts into our feedback system. We have previously rejected this as this is not a referendum system, but we will think again.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
